name: Sarah dumped you!
description:
You just got dumped, come dig inside yourself to find comfort and rebuild your life!

Controls:

-Use the arrows to move (or ZQSD if you're french)

-Use Up to jump

-Use your mouse to dig (next to the character)

The colored cone next to you is a radar pointing to the nearest source of comfort

To survive, you must constantly search for comfort to refill your "comfort gauge".

The goal is to find the the path to the next level!

IMPORTANT BUGS :

-at the end of the level with burgers and cakes you will have to wait 15 seconds for the next level to load (missing cutscene)

- on level 5 you will spawn at the end and skip it directly...

Done with cleoh

Credits : coming soon

This is obviously very rushed, we intend to polish it during the next week, so stay tuned if you want to see the game without countless problems and with all its animations!
